overview: At the beginning of movie, famous songster Zeki's lover dies of terminal illness. Then, Zeki locks himself into his mansion near the sea. He refuses to see anyone, and refuses any concert or performance offers. Her late lover willed him to get in love again. Reading Zeki's situation on newspaper, a fan of Zeki wants to help him. She tries get closer with him and her efforts sparks a love between.
title: İnleyen Nağmeler
